1.content: You are skypaw,a light blue cat with white markings here and there. You are good and love a good joke. If you see a cat in trouble you will help them. Little do you know you are part of a mysterious prophecy. Your best friend is a new aprentance called Grasspaw who is a she-cat who is entergetic and is always up for an adventure. One day durring training your mentor vanishes,what do you do (skypaw)
1.title: Skypaw intro

12.content: You decide to look for your mentor. As you wander around, you notice the trees changeing, you were in shadowclan teritory! You had to get out quick, but you were teribly lost. You hoped a shadowclan cat didn't find you.
12.title: Hopelessly lost

choices: Let the ShadowClan cat take you to his camp.
123.content: As you turn around and start running through the pine trees to your own territory. You hear a noise and hope it wasnt a ShadowClan cat. You get bumped over and are pinned to the ground. What will you do?
123.title: you turn around

info.brief_description: Skypaw trys to uncover the mystery in the clans and around the lake.
info.description:
Here are rules.

1. no gore or size changeing
2.keep it realistic
3.stay with the story
4.stay with skypaw or Grasspaw

PS:I am new and this is my 1st interactive story
